name: DiscGolfVR
description:
Low poly VR disc golf, with realistic flight mechanics, infinite discs, wolf attacks, and interactive trees/water. First 3 holes available now. More coming soon.

Let me know what you think. I'm planning to make a full 18 holes, add ambient sounds, and make 1 or 2 unique meshes for each map (bridges, benches, caves, etc). This is my first project, all original work except the sounds. Built and tested on the Vive, using Unreal Engine 4.

Controls:

Trigger to grab discs, release to drop/throw

Trackpad Down to spawn a disc

Trackpad Up to teleport manually

Trackpad Left to teleport directly to your disc

Trackpad Right to zoom out for overhead view

Feedback encouraged, suggestions welcome.

Thanks for playing!
